content.json:
The panel **Insights Information by Indicators** incorporates the use of the **TeamCymruScoutCreateIncidentAndNotify** logic app which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution to create incident for a malicious indicator.</br>
Please configure this logic app first and keep it enabled in order to notify creation of an incident for a malicious indicator.

## Indicators Overview
---

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| count
content.title: Total Indicators

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| count
content.title: Indicators Reported in Last Week

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| count
content.title: Indicators Reported in Last Day

content.json: #### Click on the count in tile **Total Indicators** above to view more information.
#### Click on the count in tile **Indicators Reported in Last Week** above to view more information.
#### Click on the count in tile **Indicators Reported in Last Day** above to view more information.

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string, IP: string, Domain:string, IPCountryCode:string, CountryCodes:string, InsightsOverallRating: string, SummaryWhoIsASName: string, SummaryWhoIsASN: real, SummaryWhoIsNetName: string, SummaryWhoIsOrgName: string, SummaryReverseHostNames: string, IdentityASN: real, IdentityASName: string, IdentityNetName: string, IdentityOrgName:string, ASInfo:string, IdentityReverseHostNames:string, IPPdnsDomain: string, PDNSDetails: dynamic, OpenPorts: string, OpenPortsDetails: dynamic, ProtocolID: string, ProtocolType: string, OpenPortServices: string, CertificateDetails: string, FingerprintsDetails: string, TagsIds: string, TagsNames: string, SummaryOpenPorts: string, SummaryPDNS: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| extend DomainCountryCodes = strcat_array(todynamic(CountryCodes), ",")
| extend ['Country Code'] = coalesce(IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes) 
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, IndicatorType, Indicator, IP, Domain
| project-away IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes, CountryCodes
| project-rename ['Insights Overall Rating'] = InsightsOverallRating, ['Summary WhoIs ASName'] = SummaryWhoIsASName, ['Summary WhoIs ASN'] = SummaryWhoIsASN, ['Summary WhoIs Net Name'] = SummaryWhoIsNetName, ['Summary WhoIs Org Name'] = SummaryWhoIsOrgName, ['Summary Reverse Host Names'] = SummaryReverseHostNames, ['Identity ASN'] = IdentityASN, ['Identity ASName'] = IdentityASName, ['Identity Net Name'] = IdentityNetName, ['Identity Org Name'] = IdentityOrgName, ['AS Info'] = ASInfo, ['Identity Reverse Host Names'] = IdentityReverseHostNames, ['PDNS Domain'] = IPPdnsDomain, ['PDNS Details'] = PDNSDetails, ['Open Ports'] = OpenPorts, ['Open Ports Details'] = OpenPortsDetails, ['Protocol ID'] = ProtocolID, ['Protocol Type'] = ProtocolType, ['Open Port Services'] = OpenPortServices, ['Certificate Details'] = CertificateDetails, ['Fingerprints Details'] = FingerprintsDetails, ['Tags Ids'] = TagsIds, ['Tags Names'] = TagsNames, ['Summary Open Ports'] = SummaryOpenPorts, ['Summary PDNS'] = SummaryPDNS
content.title: Details of Indicators

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string, IP: string, Domain:string, IPCountryCode:string, CountryCodes:string, InsightsOverallRating: string, SummaryWhoIsASName: string, SummaryWhoIsASN: real, SummaryWhoIsNetName: string, SummaryWhoIsOrgName: string, SummaryReverseHostNames: string, IdentityASN: real, IdentityASName: string, IdentityNetName: string, IdentityOrgName:string, ASInfo:string, IdentityReverseHostNames:string, IPPdnsDomain: string, PDNSDetails: dynamic, OpenPorts: string, OpenPortsDetails: dynamic, ProtocolID: string, ProtocolType: string, OpenPortServices: string, CertificateDetails: string, FingerprintsDetails: string, TagsIds: string, TagsNames: string, SummaryOpenPorts: string, SummaryPDNS: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| extend DomainCountryCodes = strcat_array(todynamic(CountryCodes), ",")
| extend ['Country Code'] = coalesce(IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes) 
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, IndicatorType, Indicator, IP, Domain
| project-away IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes, CountryCodes
| project-rename ['Insights Overall Rating'] = InsightsOverallRating, ['Summary WhoIs ASName'] = SummaryWhoIsASName, ['Summary WhoIs ASN'] = SummaryWhoIsASN, ['Summary WhoIs Net Name'] = SummaryWhoIsNetName, ['Summary WhoIs Org Name'] = SummaryWhoIsOrgName, ['Summary Reverse Host Names'] = SummaryReverseHostNames, ['Identity ASN'] = IdentityASN, ['Identity ASName'] = IdentityASName, ['Identity Net Name'] = IdentityNetName, ['Identity Org Name'] = IdentityOrgName, ['AS Info'] = ASInfo, ['Identity Reverse Host Names'] = IdentityReverseHostNames, ['PDNS Domain'] = IPPdnsDomain, ['PDNS Details'] = PDNSDetails, ['Open Ports'] = OpenPorts, ['Open Ports Details'] = OpenPortsDetails, ['Protocol ID'] = ProtocolID, ['Protocol Type'] = ProtocolType, ['Open Port Services'] = OpenPortServices, ['Certificate Details'] = CertificateDetails, ['Fingerprints Details'] = FingerprintsDetails, ['Tags Ids'] = TagsIds, ['Tags Names'] = TagsNames, ['Summary Open Ports'] = SummaryOpenPorts, ['Summary PDNS'] = SummaryPDNS
content.title: Details of Indicators from Last Week

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string, IP: string, Domain:string, IPCountryCode:string, CountryCodes:string, InsightsOverallRating: string, SummaryWhoIsASName: string, SummaryWhoIsASN: real, SummaryWhoIsNetName: string, SummaryWhoIsOrgName: string, SummaryReverseHostNames: string, IdentityASN: real, IdentityASName: string, IdentityNetName: string, IdentityOrgName:string, ASInfo:string, IdentityReverseHostNames:string, IPPdnsDomain: string, PDNSDetails: dynamic, OpenPorts: string, OpenPortsDetails: dynamic, ProtocolID: string, ProtocolType: string, OpenPortServices: string, CertificateDetails: string, FingerprintsDetails: string, TagsIds: string, TagsNames: string, SummaryOpenPorts: string, SummaryPDNS: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d)
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| extend DomainCountryCodes = strcat_array(todynamic(CountryCodes), ",")
| extend ['Country Code'] = coalesce(IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes) 
| sort by TimeGenerated asc
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, IndicatorType, Indicator, IP, Domain
| project-away IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes, CountryCodes
| project-rename ['Insights Overall Rating'] = InsightsOverallRating, ['Summary WhoIs ASName'] = SummaryWhoIsASName, ['Summary WhoIs ASN'] = SummaryWhoIsASN, ['Summary WhoIs Net Name'] = SummaryWhoIsNetName, ['Summary WhoIs Org Name'] = SummaryWhoIsOrgName, ['Summary Reverse Host Names'] = SummaryReverseHostNames, ['Identity ASN'] = IdentityASN, ['Identity ASName'] = IdentityASName, ['Identity Net Name'] = IdentityNetName, ['Identity Org Name'] = IdentityOrgName, ['AS Info'] = ASInfo, ['Identity Reverse Host Names'] = IdentityReverseHostNames, ['PDNS Domain'] = IPPdnsDomain, ['PDNS Details'] = PDNSDetails, ['Open Ports'] = OpenPorts, ['Open Ports Details'] = OpenPortsDetails, ['Protocol ID'] = ProtocolID, ['Protocol Type'] = ProtocolType, ['Open Port Services'] = OpenPortServices, ['Certificate Details'] = CertificateDetails, ['Fingerprints Details'] = FingerprintsDetails, ['Tags Ids'] = TagsIds, ['Tags Names'] = TagsNames, ['Summary Open Ports'] = SummaryOpenPorts, ['Summary PDNS'] = SummaryPDNS
content.title: Details of Indicators from Last Day

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| extend Date = format_datetime(todatetime(TimeGenerated), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
| summarize dcount(Indicator) by Date, IndicatorType
| sort by Date asc
content.title: Indicators Ingested Over Time

content.json: #### Click on a bar in panel **Indicators Ingested Over Time** above to view more information.

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string, IP: string, Domain:string, IPCountryCode:string, CountryCodes:string, InsightsOverallRating: string, SummaryWhoIsASName: string, SummaryWhoIsASN: real, SummaryWhoIsNetName: string, SummaryWhoIsOrgName: string, SummaryReverseHostNames: string, IdentityASN: real, IdentityASName: string, IdentityNetName: string, IdentityOrgName:string, ASInfo:string, IdentityReverseHostNames:string, IPPdnsDomain: string, PDNSDetails: dynamic, OpenPorts: string, OpenPortsDetails: dynamic, ProtocolID: string, ProtocolType: string, OpenPortServices: string, CertificateDetails: string, FingerprintsDetails: string, TagsIds: string, TagsNames: string, SummaryOpenPorts: string, SummaryPDNS: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| extend Date = format_datetime(todatetime(TimeGenerated), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
| where Date == '{DateTime}'
| extend DomainCountryCodes = strcat_array(todynamic(CountryCodes), ",")
| extend ['Country Code'] = coalesce(IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes) 
| project-reorder TimeGenerated, IndicatorType, Indicator, IP, Domain
| project-away IPCountryCode, DomainCountryCodes, CountryCodes, Date
| project-rename ['Insights Overall Rating'] = InsightsOverallRating, ['Summary WhoIs ASName'] = SummaryWhoIsASName, ['Summary WhoIs ASN'] = SummaryWhoIsASN, ['Summary WhoIs Net Name'] = SummaryWhoIsNetName, ['Summary WhoIs Org Name'] = SummaryWhoIsOrgName, ['Summary Reverse Host Names'] = SummaryReverseHostNames, ['Identity ASN'] = IdentityASN, ['Identity ASName'] = IdentityASName, ['Identity Net Name'] = IdentityNetName, ['Identity Org Name'] = IdentityOrgName, ['AS Info'] = ASInfo, ['Identity Reverse Host Names'] = IdentityReverseHostNames, ['PDNS Domain'] = IPPdnsDomain, ['PDNS Details'] = PDNSDetails, ['Open Ports'] = OpenPorts, ['Open Ports Details'] = OpenPortsDetails, ['Protocol ID'] = ProtocolID, ['Protocol Type'] = ProtocolType, ['Open Port Services'] = OpenPortServices, ['Certificate Details'] = CertificateDetails, ['Fingerprints Details'] = FingerprintsDetails, ['Tags Ids'] = TagsIds, ['Tags Names'] = TagsNames, ['Summary Open Ports'] = SummaryOpenPorts, ['Summary PDNS'] = SummaryPDNS
content.title: Details of Indicators Ingested Over Time

parameters.name: Indicators
parameters.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| distinct Indicator

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string, IP: string, Domain:string, ASInfo:string, SummaryWhoIsASName:string, IdentityASName:string, SummaryWhoIsASN: real, IdentityASN: real, SummaryWhoIsNetName: string, IdentityNetName: string, SummaryWhoIsOrgName: string, IdentityOrgName: string, SummaryReverseHostNames:string, IdentityReverseHostNames:string, TagsIds: string, TagsNames: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where ('*' in ({Indicators})) or (Indicator in ({Indicators}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| mv-apply todynamic(ASInfo) on ( summarize ASName = make_list(ASInfo.as_name), ASN = make_list(ASInfo.asn) by IP, Indicator)
| extend ['AS Name'] = coalesce(SummaryWhoIsASName,IdentityASName, strcat_array(ASName, ",")),
        ASN = coalesce(tostring(toint(SummaryWhoIsASN)), tostring(toint(IdentityASN)), strcat_array(ASN, ",")), 
        ['Net Name'] = coalesce(SummaryWhoIsNetName, IdentityNetName, 'N/A'),
        ['Organization Name'] = coalesce(SummaryWhoIsOrgName, IdentityOrgName, 'N/A'),
        ['Reverse Hostnames'] = coalesce(SummaryReverseHostNames, IdentityReverseHostNames, 'N/A'),
        ['Tags Ids'] = coalesce(TagsIds, 'N/A'),
        ['Tags Name'] = coalesce(TagsNames, 'N/A')
| project Indicator, ['AS Name'] = iff(['AS Name'] == "", "N/A",['AS Name']), ASN = iff(ASN == "", "N/A",ASN), ['Net Name'], ['Organization Name'], ['Reverse Hostnames'], ['Tags Ids'], ['Tags Name']
content.title: Identity Information by Indicators

content.json:
## Steps to Create Incident and Notify for a Malicious Indicator.
- Select the **Subscription ID** and **Resource Group**.
- Click on the **Run Playbook** button besides malicious indicator.
- One side panel will be open, click on the **Create Incident And Notify** button below.
- This will execute the **TeamCymruScoutCreateIncidentAndNotify** logic app in the background.
- You can check the status of the playbook to identify the creation of incident and check mail for notification.
</br>
</br>
**NOTE**: You can see Run Playbook option visible only for Malicious indicators. For others, that option is not available.

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
Resources 
| extend ResourceGroupName = resourceGroup 
| distinct ResourceGroupName

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string, InsightsOverallRating: string, Insights: string) [];
let OverviewTable=(
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where ('*' in ({Indicators})) or (Indicator in ({Indicators}))
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
|project Indicator, ["Insights Overall Rating"] = coalesce(InsightsOverallRating, 'N/A')
);
let InsightsMessageTable=(
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where ('*' in ({Indicators})) or (Indicator in ({Indicators}))
| mv-expand todynamic(Insights)
| extend insight_message = Insights.message, 
        insight_rating = Insights.rating
| extend Message = iff(isnotnull(insight_message) and isnotnull(insight_rating),strcat(insight_message, "->", insight_rating), 'N/A')
| summarize ['Insight Message With Rating'] = make_set(Message) by Indicator
| project Indicator, ['Insight Message With Rating'] = iff(['Insight Message With Rating'] == '["N/A"]', "N/A",strcat_array(['Insight Message With Rating'], ","))
);
InsightsMessageTable | join kind=fullouter OverviewTable on Indicator
| extend ['Create Incident And Notify'] = iff(tolower(["Insights Overall Rating"]) == "malicious", "Run Playbook", "")
| project Indicator, ['Insight Message With Rating'], ["Insights Overall Rating"], ['Create Incident And Notify']
content.title: Insights Information by Indicators

armActionContext.description:
# Actions can potentially modify resources.
## Please use caution and include a confirmation message in this description when authoring this command.

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, Indicator:string, IP: string, SummaryOpenPorts: string, SummaryPDNS:string, OpenPorts: string, ProtocolID: string, ProtocolType: string, OpenPortServices: string, IPPdnsDomain:string, CertificateDetails:string, FingerprintsDetails: string, PDNSDetails: dynamic, OpenPortsDetails: dynamic) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIP,
CymruScoutDomain
| where ('*' in ('{IndicatorType}')) or IndicatorType == '{IndicatorType}'
| where ('*' in ({Indicators})) or (Indicator in ({Indicators}))
| extend DomainOpenPorts = SummaryOpenPorts, DomainPDNS = SummaryPDNS
| mv-apply todynamic(SummaryOpenPorts) on ( summarize OpenPortsDomain = strcat_array(make_list(SummaryOpenPorts.port), ","), DomainProtocolID = strcat_array(make_list(SummaryOpenPorts.protocol), ","), ProtocolTypeDomain = strcat_array(make_list(SummaryOpenPorts.protocol_text), ","),OpenPortServicesDomain = strcat_array(make_list(SummaryOpenPorts.service),  ",") by IP)
| mv-apply todynamic(SummaryPDNS) on ( summarize DomainPdnsDomain = strcat_array(make_list(SummaryPDNS.domain), ","), DomainPdnsIPs = strcat_array(make_list(SummaryPDNS.ip), ",") by IP)
| extend ["Open Ports"] = coalesce(OpenPortsDomain, OpenPorts, "NA"),
        ["Protocol ID"] = coalesce(DomainProtocolID,ProtocolID, "NA"),
        ['Protocol Type'] = coalesce(ProtocolTypeDomain,ProtocolType, "NA"),
        ['Open Port Services'] = coalesce(OpenPortServicesDomain, OpenPortServices, "NA"),        
        ['Pdns Domain'] = coalesce(DomainPdnsDomain,IPPdnsDomain, "NA"),        
        ['Pdns IPs'] = coalesce(DomainPdnsIPs, "NA"),
        Certificate = coalesce(CertificateDetails, 'NA'),
        Fingerprint = coalesce(FingerprintsDetails, 'NA'),
        ['PDNS Details'] = coalesce(DomainPDNS, PDNSDetails, 'NA'),
        ['Open Ports Details'] = coalesce(DomainOpenPorts, OpenPortsDetails, 'NA')
| project Indicator, ["Open Ports"],
        ['Open Port Services'],
        ["Protocol ID"],
        ['Protocol Type'],        
        ['Pdns Domain'],        
        ['Pdns IPs'],   
        Fingerprint,
        Certificate,
        ['Open Ports Details'],
        ['PDNS Details']
content.title: Indicators Details

content.json: üìù***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***

This workbook depends on the **TeamCymruScoutLiveInvestigation** logic app which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.</br>
Please configure this logic app first and keep it enabled in order to use this workbook.

## Live Investigation
---

## Steps to perform Live Investigation using this workbook
- This workbook is intended to help perform Live Investigation for Indicators (**Type:** IP or Domain).
- Select the **Resource Group** and **Subscription ID**.
- Select Indicator Type from Type filter and provide Indicator value corresponding to it's type in the Indicator parameter.
- Click on the **Submit** button.
- One side panel will be open, click on the **Get Data** button below.
- This will execute the **TeamCymruScoutLiveInvestigation** logic app in the background.
- You will be able to see a message as **Refresh to check for data availability**.
- Click on the refresh button icon above the message until you get a message as **Click here to view the data**.
- Click on the message **Click here to view the data** and it will display all panels for searched Indicator data.
- You can check the status of the playbook to identify the Live Investigation data fetch status.
</br>
</br>
**Note** : </br>
In cases where
	* In a new environment for live investigations, it may take around 5 to 10 minutes for data ingestion and dashboard population due to Sentinel's default behavior.</br>
    * Panels do not populate, please check the status of the **TeamCymruScoutLiveInvestigation** logic app.</br>
    * It is suggested to perform a **Hard Refresh** before getting Live Investigation data for the new Indicator value. Otherwise, the source drill down panels will not be populated properly.

parameters.name: ResourceGroup
parameters.label: Resource Group
parameters.query:
Resources
| extend ResourceGroupName = resourceGroup
| distinct ResourceGroupName

armActionContext.title: Search Live Investigation For Indicator "{Indicator}"
armActionContext.description: This Action Will fetch live data from cymru scout platform to populate this dashboard.

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, ip_s: string, query_s:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table, 
(Summary_Details_CL| where '{IndicatorType}' == "IP"|where ip_s == '{IndicatorValue}') , 
(Domain_Data_CL| where '{IndicatorType}' == 'Domain'| where query_s == '{IndicatorValue}')
| summarize count()
| extend status = case(count_ == 0 , "Refresh to check for data availability","Click here to populate data.")
| project status

let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Overall Rating']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| extend Overall_Rating = case(
    tolower(['Overall Rating']) == "suspicious", "‚ö† Suspicious",
    tolower(['Overall Rating']) == "malicious", "‚ìò Malicious",
    "No Rating")
| project ['Overall Rating'] = Overall_Rating
content.title: Overall Rating

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Geo IP CC']:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| extend Country = iif(isempty(['Geo IP CC']), "NA", ['Geo IP CC'])
content.title: Country

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Org Name']: string, ["Net Name"]: string, ['As Name']: string, Asn: real) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutIdentity
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| project ["Organization Name"]=['Org Name'], ["Net Name"], ["AS Name"] = ['As Name'], ["ASN"]=Asn
content.title: Organization Details for "{IndicatorValue}"

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Insights:string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| mv-expand todynamic(Insights)
| project ['Insights']=Insights.message
content.title: Insights Information for "{IndicatorValue}"

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string) [];
let dummy_table2 = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Port: real, Service: string, Protocol: real, ['Protocol Name']: string, ['First Seen']: string, ['Last Seen']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| join kind=inner (union isfuzzy=true dummy_table2, CymruScoutSummaryTopOpenPorts | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP, Port, Protocol) on $left.IP == $right.IP
| project ['Protocol']=['Protocol Name'], Port, Service, ['First Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['First Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd"), ['Last Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['Last Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| sort by ['Last Seen'] desc
content.title: Open Ports for "{IndicatorValue}"

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string) [];
let dummy_table2 = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Domain: string, ['Event Count']: real) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| join kind=inner (union isfuzzy=true dummy_table2, CymruScoutSummaryTopPdns | summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP, Domain) on $left.IP == $right.IP
| project Domain, ['Event Count']
| sort by toint(['Event Count']) desc
content.title: Most Observed Domains for "{IndicatorValue}"

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Port: real, MD5: string, Subject: string, Issuer: string, ['Valid Days']: real, ["Not Before"]: string, ["Not After"]: string, SHA1: string, SHA256: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummaryTopCerts
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP, Port, MD5
| project
    Subject,
    Issuer,
    Port,
    ["Validity Period"] = ['Valid Days'],
    ["Not Before"],
    ["Not After"],
    MD5,
    SHA1,
    SHA256
content.title: Certificate Details for "{IndicatorValue}"

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Signature G']: string, ['Signature S']: string, ['Signature Type']: string, ['First Seen']: string, ['Last Seen']: string, Port: real) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummaryTopFingerprints
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| extend Signature = coalesce(['Signature G'], ['Signature S'])
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP, Signature, Port
| project
    Type = ['Signature Type'],
    Signature,
    ['First Seen'] = format_datetime(todatetime(['First Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    ['Last Seen'] = format_datetime(todatetime(['Last Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd"),
    Port
| sort by ['Last Seen'] desc
content.title: Most Observed Fingerprints

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string) [];
let dummy_table2 = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Domain: string, Service: string, ['First Seen']: string, ['Last Seen']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| join kind=inner (union isfuzzy=true dummy_table2, CymruScoutSummaryTopPdns| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP, Domain) on $left.IP == $right.IP
| project Domain, ['First Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['First Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd"), ['Last Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['Last Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| extend Duration = range(todatetime(['First Seen']), todatetime(['Last Seen']), 1d)  
| mv-expand Duration 
| project Domain, Timestamp = Duration  
| summarize count() by tostring(Domain), bin(todatetime(Timestamp), 1d)
content.title: PDNS

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Tag Timeline Data']: string, ['First Seen']: string, ['Last Seen']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| mv-expand todynamic(['Tag Timeline Data'])
| extend Tags = ['Tag Timeline Data'].tag.name
| project Tags, ['First Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['Tag Timeline Data'].first_seen), "yyyy-MM-dd"), ['Last Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['Tag Timeline Data'].last_seen), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| extend Duration = range(todatetime(['First Seen']), todatetime(['Last Seen']), 1d)  
| mv-expand Duration 
| project Tags, Timestamp = Duration  
| summarize count() by tostring(Tags), bin(todatetime(Timestamp), 1d)
content.title: Tags

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string) [];
let dummy_table2 = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Port: real, Protocol: real, ['First Seen']: string, ['Last Seen']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummary
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| join kind=inner (union isfuzzy=true dummy_table2, CymruScoutSummaryTopOpenPorts| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP, Port, Protocol) on $left.IP == $right.IP
| project Port, ['First Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['First Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd"), ['Last Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['Last Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| extend Duration = range(todatetime(['First Seen']), todatetime(['Last Seen']), 1d)  
| mv-expand Duration 
| project Port, Timestamp = Duration  
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(Port), bin(todatetime(Timestamp), 1d)
content.title: Open Ports

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, MD5: string, Port: real, Subject: string, Issuer: string, ['First Seen']: string, ['Last Seen']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutSummaryTopCerts
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP, Port, MD5
| extend Subject = strcat(Subject, Issuer, "=", Port)
| project Subject, ['First Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['First Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd"), ['Last Seen']=format_datetime(todatetime(['Last Seen']), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| extend Duration = range(todatetime(['First Seen']), todatetime(['Last Seen']), 1d)  
| mv-expand Duration 
| project Subject, Timestamp = Duration
| summarize Count = count() by Subject, bin(todatetime(Timestamp), 1d)
content.title: Certificate

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Proto By Date']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutProtoByIP
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| mv-expand todynamic(['Proto By Date'])
| mv-expand todynamic(['Proto By Date'].data)
| parse-where ['Proto By Date_data'] with * '"count":' Count ',"date":"' dates '"}'
| extend Date = format_datetime( todatetime(dates), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| summarize counts = sum(tolong(Count)) by Date
content.title: Events

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Proto By Date']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutProtoByIP
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| mv-expand todynamic(['Proto By Date'])
| mv-expand todynamic(['Proto By Date'].data)
| parse-where ['Proto By Date_data'] with * '"count":' Count ',"date":"' dates '"}'
| extend Date = format_datetime( todatetime(dates), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| summarize counts = sum(tolong(Count)) by Date, keyword = tostring(['Proto By Date'].keyword)
content.title: Protocols for {IndicatorValue} and Its Peers

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Datasets: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutTopServicesByIP
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| mv-expand todynamic(Datasets)
| parse-where tostring(Datasets) with * '"label":"' label '","tag_id":' tag_id ',"data":' data ',"css_color":"' css_color '","dates":' Dates '}'
| project data, label, Dates, IP
| mv-expand todynamic(data), todynamic(Dates)
| extend Date = format_datetime( todatetime(Dates), "yyyy-MM-dd")
| summarize counts = sum(todouble(data)) by Date, keyword = tostring(label)
content.title: Top 10 Services for "{IndicatorValue}" and Its Peers

| mv-expand todynamic(data), todynamic(Dates)

content.title: Top 10 Tags for "{IndicatorValue}" and Its Peers

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Datasets: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutTopCountryCodesByIP
| where IP == "{IndicatorValue}"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| mv-expand todynamic(Datasets)
| parse-where tostring(Datasets) with * '"label":"' label '","tag_id":' tag_id ',"data":' data ',"country":' Country ',"css_color":"' css_color '","dates":' Dates '}'
| project data, label, Dates, IP, Country
| mv-expand todynamic(data), todynamic(Dates)

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Modified: string, Asn: real, Cidr: string, ['As Name']: string, ['Bgp Asn']: real, ['Bgp Asn Name']: string, ['Net Name']: string, CC: string, Description: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutWhois
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| project Modified = coalesce(Modified, "-"), ASN = Asn, CIDR = coalesce(Cidr, "-"), ['AS Name'] = coalesce(['As Name'], "-"), ['BGP ASN'] = ['Bgp Asn'], ['BGP AS Name'] = coalesce(['Bgp Asn Name'], "-"), ['Net Name'] = coalesce(['Net Name'], "-"), CC = coalesce(CC, "-"), Description = coalesce(Description, "-")
content.title: General

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Admin Contact Id']: string, ['Admin Contact Role']: string, ['Admin Contact Email']: string, ['Admin Contact Phone']: string, ['Admin Contact Country']: string, ['Admin Contact Address']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutWhois
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| project ['Admin Cotact ID'] = coalesce(['Admin Contact Id'], "-"),
    ['Admin Contact Role'] = coalesce(['Admin Contact Role'], "-"),
    ['Admin Contact Email'] = coalesce(['Admin Contact Email'], "-"),
    ['Admin Contact Phone'] = coalesce(['Admin Contact Phone'], "-"),
    ['Admin Contact Country'] = coalesce(['Admin Contact Country'], "-"),
    ['Admin Contact Address'] = coalesce(['Admin Contact Address'], "-")
content.title: Admin

union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutWhois
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| project ['Tech Contact ID'] = coalesce(['Tech Contact Id'], "-"),
    ['Tech Contact Role'] = coalesce(['Tech Contact Role'], "-"),
    ['Tech Contact Email'] = coalesce(['Tech Contact Email'], "-"),
    ['Tech Contact Phone'] = coalesce(['Tech Contact Phone'], "-"),
    ['Tech Contact Country'] = coalesce(['Tech Contact Country'], "-"),

content.title: Tech

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, ['Org Id']: string, ['Org Name']: string, ['Org Email']: string, ['Org Phone']: string, ['Org Country']: string, ['Org Address']: string, ['Mnt By Email']: string, ['Mnt Router Email']: string) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutWhois
| where IP == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by IP
| project ['Organization ID'] = coalesce(['Org Id'], "-"),
    ['Organization Name'] = coalesce(['Org Name'], "-"),
    ['Organization Email'] = coalesce(['Org Email'], "-"),
    ['Organization Phone'] = coalesce(['Org Phone'], "-"),
    ['Organization Country'] = coalesce(['Org Country'], "-"),
    ['Organization Address'] = coalesce(['Org Address'], "-"),
    ['Maintained by Email'] = coalesce(['Mnt By Email'], "-"),
    ['Maintained by Router Email'] = coalesce(['Mnt Router Email'], "-")
content.title: Organization

content.query:
let dummy_table = datatable(TimeGenerated: datetime, IP: string, Domain: string, ['As Info']: string, ['Country Codes']: string, ['Comms Total']: real) [];
union isfuzzy=true dummy_table,
CymruScoutDomainData
| where Domain == '{IndicatorValue}'
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Domain, IP
| mv-expand todynamic(['As Info'])
| extend CountryCode = todynamic(['Country Codes'])
| project IP, ['Country Codes']=CountryCode[0], ['AS Name']=['As Info'].as_name, ['Events Communication']=['Comms Total']
| sort by tostring(IP) asc
content.title: Domain Details for: "{IndicatorValue}"

## Account Usage

content.query:
let dummy_table=datatable(['Query Limit']: real, ['Used Queries']: real, ['Remaining Queries']: real, ['Used Queries (%)']: real, ['Foundation Query Limit']: real, ['Used Foundation Queries']: real, ['Remaining Foundation Queries']: real, ['Used Foundation Queries (%)']: real)[];
union isfuzzy=true
dummy_table,
CymruScoutAccountUsage
| project ['Query Limit'], ['Used Queries'], ['Remaining Queries'], ['Used Queries (%)'], ['Foundation Query Limit'], ['Used Foundation Queries'], ['Remaining Foundation Queries'], ['Used Foundation Queries (%)']
content.title: Account Usage Details

content.json: üìù***Refresh the web page to fetch details of recently collected events***

This tab depends on the **ASIM Parsers** and **ThreatIntelligenceIndicators**.</br>
Please configure ASIM Parsers in the workspace and create/upload some indicators in ThreatIntelligence to visualize data in this tab.

## Correlation Overview
---

## Steps to perform Correlation using this workbook
- This workbook is intended to help perform Correlation of Indicators (**Indicator Type:** IP or Domain).
- Select **Time Range** for which you want to perform correlation of other sources data with Team Cymru Scout data.
- Select **Indicator Type** from Indicator Type filter. Default All is selected.
- Select **Search Matching Algorithm** based on which you want to perform correlation of other sources data with Team Cymru Scout Data.
	- **ThreatIntelligenceIndicator**: Threat indicators are data that associate observed artifacts such as URLs, file hashes, or IP addresses with known threat activity such as phishing, botnets, or malware. 
	- **ASIM Parsers**: The Advanced Security Information Model (ASIM) provides a seamless experience for handling various sources in uniform, normalized views. ASIM allows for predictable entities correlation across normalized tables
- If you select **ASIM Parsers** in "Search Matching Algorithm", filter for ASIM Parsers will be visible.
	- Select ASIM Parsers schema from **ASIM Parsers** filter. Default All is selected.
- Based on selected filters, correlated data will be visible in below panles.
</br>
</br>
**Note** : </br>
	* If data is not populated, 
		- Check ASIM Parsers schema is available in workspace and does not have any error. 
		- Check ThreatIntelligenceIndicator table has indicators available from other sources.

## Steps to configure ASIM Parsers in workspace
- Go to **[ASIM](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/ASIM)** folder in Azure-Sentinel Repository.
- Select Schema you want to add from list of available schema in README.md. e.g. *NetworkSession*
- Click on the **Deploy to Azure** button besides NetworkSession Schema.
- You will be redirected to the custom deployment page where you need to provide information for **Resource group**, **Region**, **Workspace name** and **Workspace Region**.
- Click on the **Review+Create** button. 
- Review the next dialog from Azure, and then click on **Create** to install the ASIM parser.
- Follow the same steps to deploy the ASIM Parsers for below schemas:
	- *WebSession*
	- *DNS*
	- *DHCP*
	- *Audit*
	- *Authentication*
</br>

content.query:
let asimdata = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", dynamic([{ASIMParsers}]), dynamic([]));
let dummy_table = datatable(Indicator: string)[];
union isfuzzy=true
dummy_table,
CymruScoutCorrelate(indicatorType='{TypeIndicator}',
    searchAlgo='{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}',
    asimParsers=asimdata)
    | summarize Count = dcount(Indicator)
content.title: Total Matched Indicators

content.query:
let asimdata = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", dynamic([{ASIMParsers}]), dynamic([]));
let dummy_table = datatable(Indicator: string, IndicatorType: string)[];
union isfuzzy=true
dummy_table,
CymruScoutCorrelate(indicatorType='{TypeIndicator}',
    searchAlgo='{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}',
    asimParsers=asimdata)
| summarize Count=dcount(Indicator) by IndicatorType
content.title: Matched Indicators by Type

content.json: #### Click on the count in panel **Total Matched Indicators** above to view more information.
#### Click on the section in panel **Matched Indicators by Type** above to view more information.

content.query:
let asimdata = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", dynamic([{ASIMParsers}]), dynamic([]));
let dummy_table = datatable(Indicator: string, TimeGenerated: datetime, IndicatorType: string, EventVendor: string, EventProduct: string, EventSchema: string)[];
union isfuzzy=true
dummy_table,
CymruScoutCorrelate(indicatorType='{TypeIndicator}',
    searchAlgo='{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}',
    asimParsers=asimdata)
| extend Source = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", EventSchema, "ThreatIntelligenceIndicator")
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| project Indicator, TimeGenerated, IndicatorType, Source
content.title: Details for Total Matched Indicators

content.query:
let asimdata = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", dynamic([{ASIMParsers}]), dynamic([]));
let dummy_table = datatable(Indicator: string, IndicatorType: string, TimeGenerated: datetime, EventSchema: string)[];
union isfuzzy=true
dummy_table,
CymruScoutCorrelate(indicatorType='{TypeIndicator}',
    searchAlgo='{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}',
    asimParsers=asimdata)
| extend IndicatorType = tostring(IndicatorType)
| where IndicatorType == '{Type}'
| extend Source = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", EventSchema, "ThreatIntelligenceIndicator")
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| project Indicator, TimeGenerated, IndicatorType, Source
content.title: Details for Matched Indicators by Type

content.query:
let asimdata = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", dynamic([{ASIMParsers}]), dynamic([]));
let dummy_table = datatable(Indicator: string, IndicatorType: string, TimeGenerated: datetime, EventSchema: string)[];
let correlateddata = union isfuzzy=true
dummy_table,
CymruScoutCorrelate(indicatorType='{TypeIndicator}',
    searchAlgo='{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}',
    asimParsers=asimdata);
let indicatorcount = correlateddata
    | summarize Count=count() by Indicator;
correlateddata
| extend Source = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", EventSchema, "ThreatIntelligenceIndicator")
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Indicator
| join kind=inner(indicatorcount) on Indicator
| project Indicator, IndicatorType, Source, TimeGenerated, Count
content.title: Matched Indicators Details

content.json: #### Click on the cell in grid panel **Matched Indicators Details** above to view more information related to Indicator from Other Source.

content.query:
let asimdata = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", dynamic([{ASIMParsers}]), dynamic([]));
let dummy_table = datatable(Indicator: string, IndicatorType: string, TimeGenerated: datetime, EventSchema: string)[];
union isfuzzy=true
dummy_table,
CymruScoutCorrelate(indicatorType='{TypeIndicator}',
    searchAlgo='{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}',
    asimParsers=asimdata)
| where Indicator == '{Indicator}'
| extend Source = iff('{SearchMatchingAlgorithm}' == "ASIM Parsers", EventSchema, "ThreatIntelligenceIndicator")
| project-reorder Indicator, IndicatorType, TimeGenerated, Source
content.title: Matched Indicator Details from Other Source
